attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Insurance is getting stupidly expensive, what we should do is take the system they have in Denmark. The government has a pot for the year for insurance claims, we all pay equally into the pot. If the pot goes under one year, it’s increased the next.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
